duties_responsibilities.duty: Performing intrusion analysis using SIEM technology, packet captures, reports, data visualization, and log analysis.
Acting as the first responder to security events and escalations across user networks and cloud environments.
Assisting in the remediation of all information security incidents and identifying threat actors.
Documenting and communicating findings, escalating critical incidents, and interacting with lines of business.
Improving and challenging existing processes and procedures in a fast-paced cyber security environment.
Staying current on the threat landscape and cyber security trends. Thought leadership around new security alert content creation.
Mentoring and training the core analyst team and providing escalation support.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent IT/Security industry experience. Industry recognized professional certifications preferred.
